bug.description:
Hi, Thanks for the help you have given for training smaller dimensional images. Here are some images where I couldn't able to find the page. Could you please tell me how your code works and what are the changes I have to make for detecting every single images like this? Note: These images are captured with mobile without flash and with flash.But no result in detecting the page. Please help. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/39292734/53882357-25ecc480-403c-11e9-8d0e-b77924855eda.jpg></denchmark-link>

comments.comment:
Hi, you should look into <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Breta01/handwriting-ocr/blob/master/notebooks/page_detection.ipynb>page_detection.ipynb</denchmark-link> . There is the whole process. First I would recommend making better pictures. You should try to cover most of the photo with the page (it must be at leas half of the area) and trying to have good contrast between background and paper. The whole process of detection is described here: <denchmark-link:https://bretahajek.com/2017/01/scanning-documents-photos-opencv/>https://bretahajek.com/2017/01/scanning-documents-photos-opencv/</denchmark-link>
I don't have much time to look closer to it right now. For processing the images are downscaled, you can start with changing this size.
Thank you so much for the information.
